snippet: In a world increasingly run by engineers and algorithms, the familiar Rubik’s Cube has found a new relevance, engaging a new generation of puzzlers, many born decades after its initial heyday.
abstract: Rubik's Cube is experiencing a resurgence of popularity among a new generation of puzzle enthusiasts; puzzle's enduring popularity is ascribed both to nostalgia and its minimalist design, which easily crosses boundaries of culture and age.
lead_paragraph: In a world increasingly run by engineers and algorithms, the familiar Rubik’s Cube has found a new relevance, engaging a new generation of puzzlers, many born decades after its initial heyday.

headline.seo: Rubik’s Cube Enjoys Another Turn in the Spotlight
headline.main: Rubik’s Cube Twists Back Into Limelight
headline.print_headline: Rubik’s Cube Twists Back Into Limelight
